about_the_game:
In Tattoo Removal Simulator, you take on the role of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Set in a small studio in a bustling city, your all clients share one goal: erasing parts of their past, marked by colorful images, texts, secrets, and stories. From light-hearted humor and dark jokes to life experiences filled with drama, love, and joy, each tattoo tells a unique tale.

GAMEPLAY

Discover the satisfaction of revealing clean skin as you erase intricate tattoos and uncover the personal tales behind them. Enjoy a soothing pace that lets you focus on the calming process of tattoo removal. Be mindful of the pain you cause—too much discomfort, and you could lose earnings!

GAME MODES

  • Career Mode - Build and manage your tattoo removal studio. Use your tablet to find clients and track their stories. Earn money by delivering high-quality work; mistakes lead to penalties and unhappy customers. Upgrade your studio, purchase new equipment and unlock advanced tools, from simple lasers to futuristic plasma lasers, and grow your business.

  • Casual Mode - Jump into a casual, relaxing experience. Random clients and fun tattoo removal sessions await you. No pressure, no penalties—just enjoy the process of cleaning away ink.

  • Story Mode - Experience unique and unpredictable stories right in your studio. Some may take you to a fascinating locations, while others may be interrupted by unexpected events. Immerse yourself and find out how these stories unfold!

    In the world where every tattoo tells a story, and every removal brings a sense of peace and satisfaction - discover the art of tattoo removal in a game that’s all about relaxation, storytelling, and transformation.

VR SUPPORTED

Take your immersion to the next level and experience the game with full VR support, adding a new dimension that makes each moment even more thrilling and memorable.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760, AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR - Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
